original_text: any of the Lord’s commands to you through him, from the day the Lord gave them and continuing through the generations to come—
korean_text: 곧 여호와께서 모세를 통하여 너희에게 명령한 모든 것을 여호와께서 명령한 날 이후부터 너희 대대에 지키지 못하여

sentences.original_text: any of the Lord's commands to you through him
sentences.korean_translation: 그를 통해 당신에게 주어진 주님의 명령 중 어떤 것이라도

sentences.original_text: from the day the Lord gave them
and continuing through the generations to come
